Dependencias Necesitas Sleuthkit, python, foremost Para instalar # make install Para desinstalar # make uninstall
Dependences You need Sleuthkit, python, foremost To install # make install To uninstall # make uninstall

recovermypartition 0.2 ====================== - Solucionado error si no se declaraba --partition - Se ha añadido soporte internacional para la documentación con omegat - Se ha cambiado la forma interna del proyecto
recovermypartition 0.2 ====================== - Bug solved when you don't set --partition - Added international support for the documentation omegat - Project has changed internally
